instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open the Settings app . Tap Apps & notifications and then Advanced and then Default apps and then Assist & voice input . Turn on Use screenshot .

On your phone or tablet, touch and hold the Home button. In the bottom right, tap . In the top right, tap your Profile picture or initial . Tap Settings and then Assistant . Under Assistant devices, tap your device. Under General, turn on Use screen context .
On your phone or tablet, open your Settings app . Scroll down and tap Tips & support . Choose phone or chat support.
On your Android phone or tablet, touch and hold the Home button. In the bottom right, tap . In the top right, tap your Profile picture or initial . Tap Send feedback .
On your Android phone or tablet, touch and hold the Home button. In the bottom right, tap . In the top right, tap your Profile picture or initial . Tap Settings and then Send feedback .
